name: La Guerre dans les Etoiles
description:
What if Star Wars had been created in France, in the 1900s ? We'll, you'd have some  moustache-wearing French gentlemen fighting the evil Galaktisches Reich.

This game is an art project, an extension of the imagery I explore in some of my collage works, created for people to play during my exhibitions.  I'm no game designer, and I'm not pretending it's a good game : it's quite stupid, has poor animation and gameplay, has only one level and no real goal except beating the final boss and reaching a high score. So no need for any hating or trolling : if you don't like it or just don't get it, don't play !

And if you'd like to know more about what i do :

http://stab-art.com/

https://www.behance.net/stab

https://www.facebook.com/Stabeor/
